caption.p: Comparison of antioxidant activities of alcohol extracts from raw materials of qīng-căo-chá tea with UV>5. The raw materials are presented in descending order using the raw material UV. Extracts were tested at a concentration of 250 µg/ml, and the scavenging rate of each raw material was converted into the relative DPPH scavenging rate (%) of BHT using the scavenging rate of the positive control with BHT as the denominator. Values are expressed as the mean ± standard deviation (n=4). Plant name codes: PP, Platostoma palustre (Blume) A.J.Paton; BP, Bidens pilosa L.; SC, Sphagneticola calendulacea (L.) Pruski; RN, Rhinacanthus nasutus (L.) Kurz; IA, Ilex asprella (Hook. & Arn.) Champ ex Benth.; GB, Glossocardia bidens (Retz.) Veldkamp; OG, Ocimum gratissimum L.; KJ, Kadsura japonica (L.) Dunal; SP, Salvia plebeia R. Br.; SD, Scoparia dulcis L.; MR, Mallotus repandus (Willd.) Muell.-Arg.; CC, Clerodendrum cyrtophyllum Turcz.; and TD, Tithonia diversifolia (Hemsl.) A. Gray.
